txt.en: 'The lampwrights of Thorin's Hall have few rivals in these days.'
'Gold and silver flow like water from these hills.'
'Why, just the other day we uncovered new veins of silver.'
'Many beautiful gems were squandered by the Dourhands.'
'The evil deeds of Skorgr√≠m are still hot in our hearts.'
'New statues are being wrought with care. Dwarves are being called in from as far as Bree to assist in the cutting of the rock. '
'The stonewrights of Thorin's Hall are the best in the land. '
'The hammer is only as hard as the hand that wields it.'
'The forges of Thorin's Hall burn hot.'
'A monument I would build in honour of Dwalin, if alone, and it took a hundred years!'
'Ever the forges are at work in these halls.'
'Never idle are the hands of a dwarf.'
'My heart yearns for the creation of great masonry, not gear of war.'
'Many of the works of our fathers have been marred by the cursed Dourhands.'
'It will be long and slow to repair the hurts of the Dourhands.'
'I hear that Dwalin is to commission a great work in honour of one of his old travelling companions...not even a dwarf they say!  What strange times these are.'
'Oft we will find some stonework fallen or crumbling...work of the goblins I say.  '
'If you are looking for an expert in the forging of steel look no further!'
'There are many of our folk working away in Bree.'
'Before the year's end, I hope to pilgrimage to the Lonely Mountain.'
